H0.text: who won the mens figure skating in 2018 olympics. Yuzuru Hanyu

H1.text: who won the mens figure skating in 2018 olympics. Nathan Chen

H2.text: who won the mens figure skating in 2018 olympics. Javier Fernández

H3.text: who won the mens figure skating in 2018 olympics. Shoma Uno

A4.text: Hanyu placed first in the short program with a new Olympic record and finished first overall ahead of Shoma Uno (silver) and Javier Fernández (bronze).

A5.text: Shoma Uno won the silver medal in the 2018 Olympics.
